      • getOccurrencesNumber

        public static int getOccurrencesNumber​(java.lang.String body,
                                       java.lang.String keyword)
        Returns occurrences number from introduced keyword.

        This method always returns occurrences number from introduced keyword.

        Parameters:
        body - a reference to check occurrences number.
        keyword - a key that allows to check keyword number finded.
        Returns:
        Occurrences number.
